sentences.sentence: The whole area has been shocked by the desecration of the cemetery.
sentences.translation: 整个地区都被对公墓的亵渎震惊了。

sentences.sentence: Desecration, and so forth, and lectured you on dignity and sanctity.
sentences.translation: 比如亵渎神圣等。想用尊严和神圣不可侵犯之类的话来打动你们。

sentences.sentence: Desecration of the time, the negative of its debt, it will be severely punished by it!
sentences.translation: 亵渎了时间，负了它的债，就将受到它的严惩！
